channel.title: Hacking on programmerraja blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking on programmerraja blog

item.title: A Journey into Unseen Threats on our VM
item.description: As the sun set on a typical Saturday evening, I found myself engrossed in a blog titled “Visualizing Malicious IP Addresses.” The author shared clever ways to detect unauthorized attempts to access virtual machines via SSH, using commands like: $ journalctl --since "-1d" -u sshd | grep "Failed password" | wc -l $ journalctl --since "-1d" -u sshd | grep "Failed publickey" | wc -l Curious, I decided to try these commands on our own VM.
